## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G48330](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G48330)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATPIMT1, PIMT1</u>
- **Gene Name:** Arabidopsis thaliana protein-l-isoaspartate methyltransferase 1, protein-l-isoaspartate methyltransferase 1
- **Description:**   protein-l-isoaspartate methyltransferase 1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:504955645
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [pimt1-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Higher PIMT protein levels in dry seeds as compared to WT. Seeds are more resistant to aging than WT.  Mutant plants are morphologically similar to WT.
